title: Blanc De Chene (Bikfaya)
summary: Easily accessed via Bekfaya’s main road, Blanc De Chene comfortably accommodates up to 200 guests indoors and 500 outdoors. Upon arrival, their professional valet service will safely park the vehicles in a designated spot, and your guests will then be escorted to an elegantly seated welcome area with live piano performance, for them to enjoy their welcome drinks.
description: Easily accessed via Bekfaya’s main road, Blanc De Chene comfortably accommodates up to 200 guests indoors and 500 outdoors. Upon arrival, their professional valet service will safely park the vehicles in a designated spot, and your guests will then be escorted to an elegantly seated welcome area with live piano performance, for them to enjoy their welcome drinks.
highlights: Live piano performance (in the welcome drink area)
2 LCD’s installed in the Welcome Drink area & a Large LED screen in the ceremony area
Fake cake, real cake, and volcanoes

title: Byblos Sur Mer (Jbeil)
summary: Exquisitely located at the edge of the sea, and at the most prominent spot of Byblos Harbor, Byblos Sur Mer hotel provides privacy and serenity in a truly charming setting and offers its guests the comforts of a home at the heart of a legend. Byblos Sur Mer overlooks the ancient Byblos port and castle on one side, and a panoramic view of the Mediterranean sea on the other, in a carefully decorated space furnished with local art and artisanal wares, ancient relics, and precious items from private collections.
description: Exquisitely located at the edge of the sea, and at the most prominent spot of Byblos Harbor, Byblos Sur Mer hotel provides privacy and serenity in a truly charming setting and offers its guests the comforts of a home at the heart of a legend. Byblos Sur Mer overlooks the ancient Byblos port and castle on one side, and a panoramic view of the Mediterranean sea on the other, in a carefully decorated space furnished with local art and artisanal wares, ancient relics, and precious items from private collections.
highlights: Fully dedicated team as the hotel undertakes one wedding per night
Complimentary Wedding Coordinator on the wedding day
Lounges for the welcome drink area
Housekeeping team in charge of the wedding area
Discounted prices for hotel accommodation for family and friends

title: Domaine De Padoue (Ghbale)
summary: Amazing venue at the heart of nature. Perfect for those seeking a natural and simple setting with an awesome view of the sunset! Yoga mats
description: Amazing venue at the heart of nature. Perfect for those seeking a natural and simple setting with an awesome view of the sunset! Yoga mats

title: Nuit Blanche (Mar Roukoz)
summary: Nuit Blanche will leave you charmed by its marvelous green hills overlooking the city of Beirut. Located among the pine trees, it will give you the best of both spirits, nature and a city view. We say “fêtez à votre manière” because Nuit Blanche offers you both Outdoor and Indoor areas to suit all types of events, regardless of the weather conditions.
description: Nuit Blanche will leave you charmed by its marvelous green hills overlooking the city of Beirut. Located among the pine trees, it will give you the best of both spirits, nature and a city view. We say “fêtez à votre manière” because Nuit Blanche offers you both Outdoor and Indoor areas to suit all types of events, regardless of the weather conditions.

title: Aldea (Ain Saadeh)
summary: Located among majestic hills of Ain Saadeh at 400 meters above sea level, ALDEA Events Venue affords breathtaking panoramic views of both the mountains and the beautiful coast of Beirut, and only 10 minutes from Beirut.
description: Located among majestic hills of Ain Saadeh at 400 meters above sea level, ALDEA Events Venue affords breathtaking panoramic views of both the mountains and the beautiful coast of Beirut, and only 10 minutes from Beirut.

title: Blanchic (Baabdat)
summary: Blanchic is a modern outdoor venue, designed to host all kinds of events from weddings and engagements to entertainment and fashion shows. Perched on the edge of a mountain cliff in Baabdath, the venue reveals its charm to the virgin mountains of the Metn area, creating an unparalleled mood and a humidity-free atmosphere.
description: Blanchic is a modern outdoor venue, designed to host all kinds of events from weddings and engagements to entertainment and fashion shows. Perched on the edge of a mountain cliff in Baabdath, the venue reveals its charm to the virgin mountains of the Metn area, creating an unparalleled mood and a humidity-free atmosphere.

title: Prime Valley Resort
summary: Prime Valley Pool & Venue is ideal for wedding ceremonies and receptions. The perfect place to spend a lovely weekend with family and friends. The venue is surrounded by pine trees and located in one of the most beautiful Chouf villages Nabea Al Safa.
description: Prime Valley Pool & Venue is ideal for wedding ceremonies and receptions. The perfect place to spend a lovely weekend with family and friends. The venue is surrounded by pine trees and located in one of the most beautiful Chouf villages Nabea Al Safa.

title: Domaine De Zekrit
summary: Nestled perfectly between the lush valleys of Mount Lebanon, Domaine de Zekrit has seen the rise and fall of great empires dating as far back as the Phoenician Era whose remnants can still be seen around the venue.
description: Nestled perfectly between the lush valleys of Mount Lebanon, Domaine de Zekrit has seen the rise and fall of great empires dating as far back as the Phoenician Era whose remnants can still be seen around the venue.

title: Orizon (Jbeil)
summary: Orizon Byblos Resort is located on the main road of Hboub, four minutes away from the heart of the beautiful Byblos city. It is a romantic, tranquil resort that highlights Lebanon’s surreal scenery and stimulates the senses. It consists of indoor and outdoor elegant, unique, deluxe venues that are professionally prepared and are thus, the perfect getaway and event setting where every natural element conspires to please all your needs and desires in mind.
description: Orizon Byblos Resort is located on the main road of Hboub, four minutes away from the heart of the beautiful Byblos city. It is a romantic, tranquil resort that highlights Lebanon’s surreal scenery and stimulates the senses. It consists of indoor and outdoor elegant, unique, deluxe venues that are professionally prepared and are thus, the perfect getaway and event setting where every natural element conspires to please all your needs and desires in mind.

title: Swanlake (Mar Moussa)
summary: Swanlake is a naturally wild outdoor wedding and event venue, nestled atop a cliff, among a forest of trees in Mar Moussa, Al Douar. The venue occupies 10,000 sqm of rich greenery, and visitors are greeted by the elegance of its swans and flamingos gliding on our picturesque lake under the silver summer moon.
